prizeListMission1:
Superheroes deserve super prizes. This is a Gold Rewards game, meaning that the Crime Fighter who finds the location of the Viper first will be awarded all of the following prizes:

- A Mafia Bike Kush 2+ BMX
- Â£250 cash
- HeroGames winner t-shirt

Runner-up prizes are also available.

Please note that for security reasons, cash prizes may be paid via bank transfer at the discretion of our staff.

Good luck, Crime Fighter.
emailMission1:
This is a holding email for Mission One.

If the game is live, this indicates an error. Call 0207 971 1453.
